channel.title: View/Note on Thought Voyager
channel.description: Recent content in View/Note on Thought Voyager

item.description: [!TASK] To Do’s Create a button to create the note Create dataview queries to sort them (use the by date example as a reference) Add the dynamic Created field as a property (can just copy the one from [[Note Template]] but I couldn’t put it in here or else it would have been triggered) Delete this task By Date Link to heading TABLE Status, tags, Links from #{{VALUE:Note Type Tag (ex.

name QuickAdd: ‚õ∞Ô∏è Create Area Note type command action QuickAdd: ‚õ∞Ô∏è Create Area Note Manually Organized Link to heading %% Type them out here for your own hierarchical directory %% By File Name Link to heading table file.frontmatter.Group as Group FROM #area and !outgoing([[]]) and !"Hidden" sort file.frontmatter.Group, file.name asc

To see your focus for the relevant timeframe instead, visit [[My Vision Board]] name QuickAdd: üìÜ Create Periodic Note type command action QuickAdd: üìÜ Create Periodic Note Daily Notes Link to heading table Rating as ‚≠ê, Summary, Story, headings as ‚úçÔ∏è from #reviews/daily AND !"Hidden" sort file.name desc LIMIT 5 Weekly Reviews Link to heading table Total as ‚≠ê, Summary, Personal, Career from #reviews/weekly AND !"Hidden" sort file.name desc LIMIT 5 Monthly Reviews Link to heading table Total as ‚≠ê, Summary, Personal, Career from #reviews/monthly AND !
table Rating as ‚≠ê, Summary, Story, headings as ‚úçÔ∏è from #reviews/daily AND !"Hidden" sort file.name desc LIMIT 50
table Total as ‚≠ê, Summary, Personal, Career from #reviews/monthly AND !"Hidden" sort file.name desc LIMIT 12
table Total as ‚≠ê, Summary, Personal, Career from #reviews/quarterly AND !"Hidden" sort file.name desc LIMIT 10
table Total as ‚≠ê, Summary, Personal, Career from #reviews/weekly AND !"Hidden" sort file.name desc LIMIT 26
table Total as ‚≠ê, Summary, Personal, Career from #reviews/yearly AND !"Hidden" sort file.name desc LIMIT 10
file:.canvas

By Status Link to heading Backlog üü• Link to heading table list("üéØ " + Description, "üí° " + Why) as "Details", Area FROM #goal AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") sort file.mtime desc Active üü® Link to heading table list("üéØ " + Description, "üí° " + Why) as "Details", Timeframe, Area FROM #goal AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü®") sort file.mtime desc Finished üü© Link to heading table list("üéØ " + Description, "üí° " + Why) as "Details", Area FROM #goal AND !

The home of my [[Evergreen Notes]] Seedlings üå± Link to heading Notes ready for nurturing table date(today) - date(file.cday) as "Days Alive" from !"Hidden" where contains(file.tags, "note/üå±") or contains(Status, "üå±") sort Created desc Sprouts üåø Link to heading Notes in progress table date(today) - date(file.cday) as "Days Alive" from !"Hidden" where contains(file.tags, "note/üåø") or contains(Status, "üåø") sort file.mtime desc Trees üå≤ Link to heading Notes ready to be part of the forest

For [[Creating and tracking your own habits and metrics]] [!TIP]+ Check my workflow Visit https://publish.obsidian.md/johnmavrick/My+habits+workflow to see how I track my workflow Can create a holistic dashboard to track all your habits in [[My Habits Board.canvas|‚ôªÔ∏è My Habits Board]] Can edit the templates that create each habit by visiting: [[Task Tracker Addon]] [[Metric Tracker Addon]] By Type Link to heading TABLE Frequency, HabitGroup, Goal, Area FROM #habitNote and !"Hidden" SORT file.

name QuickAdd: üóÑÔ∏è Create Input Collection Note type command action QuickAdd: üóÑÔ∏è Create Input Collection Note By Type Link to heading Turn into their own notes when they get bigger None Link to heading TABLE Status, tags, Links from #inputCollection AND !"Hidden" where !contains(file.tags, "/") sort Created desc Courses Link to heading #inputCollection/course TABLE Status, tags, Links from #inputCollection/course AND !"Hidden" sort Created desc Series Link to heading #inputCollection/series TABLE Status, tags, Links from #inputCollection/series AND !

By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/articles AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status SORT started desc Not Started üü• Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/articles AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") SORT started desc Consuming Media üüß Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/articles AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üüß") SORT started desc Implementation üü® Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/articles AND !

name QuickAdd: üìö Add Book Input type command action QuickAdd: üìö Add Book Input To make the most of your books, see [[My Book Applications]] By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/books AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status OR contains(Status, "No Status") sort Created desc Not Started üü• Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/books WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") sort Created desc Consuming Media üüß Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/books WHERE contains(Status, "üüß") sort Created desc Implementation üü® Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/books WHERE contains(Status, "üü®") sort Created desc Finished üü© Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/books WHERE contains(Status, "üü©") sort Created desc Archived ‚¨õÔ∏è Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/books WHERE contains(Status, "‚¨õÔ∏è") sort Created desc

Refer to [[My Inputs Workflow]] name QuickAdd: üì• Add General Input type command action QuickAdd: üì• Add General Input By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status SORT Created desc Backlog üü• Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") SORT Created desc Note Taking üüß Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input AND !

By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/podcasts AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status OR contains(Status, "No Status") sort Created desc Not Started üü• Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/podcasts WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") sort Created desc Consuming Media üüß Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/podcasts WHERE contains(Status, "üüß") sort Created desc Implementation üü® Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/podcasts WHERE contains(Status, "üü®") sort Created desc Finished üü© Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/podcasts WHERE contains(Status, "üü©") sort Created desc Archived ‚¨õÔ∏è Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/podcasts WHERE contains(Status, "üü©") sort Created desc

By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/videos AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status OR contains(Status, "No Status") sort Created desc Not Started üü• Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/videos WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") sort Created desc Consuming Media üüß Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/videos WHERE contains(Status, "üüß") sort Created desc Implementation üü® Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/videos WHERE contains(Status, "üü®") sort Created desc Finished üü© Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/videos WHERE contains(Status, "üü©") sort Created desc Archived ‚¨õÔ∏è Link to heading table Created, Links, Source FROM #input/videos WHERE contains(Status, "üü©") sort Created desc

See [[Kanban Plugin]] for how to use! name Create Kanban type command action QuickAdd: üìå Create Kanban All Link to heading table file.mtime as "Last Modified" from !"Hidden" where kanban-plugin = "basic" sort file.mtime desc

name QuickAdd: üó£ Create Meeting Note type command action QuickAdd: üó£ Create Meeting Note By Status Link to heading Not Started üü• Link to heading TABLE Attendees, Summary FROM #meeting AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") SORT Created DESC Processing üü® Link to heading TABLE Attendees, Summary FROM #meeting AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü®") SORT Created DESC Completed üü© Link to heading TABLE Attendees, Summary FROM #meeting AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü©") SORT Created DESC Archived ‚¨õÔ∏è Link to heading TABLE Attendees, Summary FROM #meeting AND !

name QuickAdd: üí™ Create Book Application Note type command action QuickAdd: üí™ Create Book Application Note By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table Created FROM #output/bookapplications AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status OR contains(Status, "No Status") sort file.mtime desc Backlog üü• Link to heading table Created FROM #output/bookapplications AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") sort file.mtime desc Active üü® Link to heading table Created FROM #output/bookapplications AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü®") sort file.

name QuickAdd: üí° Create Brainstorm Note type command action QuickAdd: üí° Create Brainstorm Note By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table Created, Links FROM #output/brainstorm AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status sort file.mtime desc Backlog üü• Link to heading table Created, Links FROM #output/brainstorm AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") sort file.mtime desc Active üü® Link to heading table Created, Links FROM #output/brainstorm AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü®") sort file.

No button for this one whoops All Link to heading By Date Link to heading table Status, Created from #output AND !"Hidden" sort Created desc By Type Link to heading [[My Brainstorms]] Link to heading [[My Book Applications]] Link to heading

name QuickAdd: üöß Create Project Note type command action QuickAdd: üöß Create Project Note By Status Link to heading No Status Link to heading table list("üéØ " + Description, "üí° " + Why) as "Details", Deadline, Goal, Area FROM #project AND !"Hidden" WHERE !Status SORT Deadline asc Elaboration üü• Link to heading table list("üéØ " + Description, "üí° " + Why) as "Details", Deadline, Goal, Area FROM #project AND !"Hidden" WHERE contains(Status, "üü•") SORT Deadline asc Upcoming üüß Link to heading table list("üéØ " + Description, "üí° " + Why) as "Details", Deadline, Goal, Area FROM #project AND !

name QuickAdd: üó∫Ô∏è Create MOC Note type command action QuickAdd: üó∫Ô∏è Create MOC Note Manually Organized Link to heading %% Type them out here for your own hierarchical directory %% By Last Modified Link to heading table file.mday from #moc and !outgoing([[]]) and !"Hidden" sort file.mday desc limit 10 By Alphabetical Link to heading list from #moc and !outgoing([[]]) and !"Hidden" sort file.name asc By Amount of Links Link to heading TABLE length(file.

Create a MOC then tag it with #resource to show up here Manually Organized Link to heading %% Type them out here for your own hierarchical directory %% By Last Created Link to heading list from #resource and !outgoing([[]]) and !"Hidden" sort file.mtime desc limit 10 By Alphabetical Link to heading list from #resource and !outgoing([[]]) and !"Hidden" sort file.name asc

name QuickAdd: üë§ Create Person Note type command action QuickAdd: üë§ Create Person Note By Relationship Link to heading None Link to heading TABLE MBTI, Sentence from #person AND !"Hidden" where !contains(file.tags, "/") sort file.ctime desc Family Link to heading TABLE MBTI, Sentence from #person/family AND !"Hidden" sort file.name asc Work Link to heading TABLE MBTI, Sentence from #person/work AND !"Hidden" sort file.name asc Friend Link to heading TABLE MBTI, Sentence from #person/friend AND !

Categories Link to heading None Link to heading table Created, Links from #thought AND !"Hidden" where !contains(file.tags, "/") sort file.ctime desc Memories Link to heading #thought/memories Anecdotes, stories and experiences table Created, tags, Links from #thought/memories AND !"Hidden" sort Created desc Reflections Link to heading #thought/reflections Personal lessons and observations table Created, tags, Links from #thought/reflections AND !"Hidden" sort Created desc Musings Link to heading #thought/musings Random shower ideas and observations

To manually organize them beyond just queries you can just modify [[My Home]] By Type Link to heading Custom Link to heading Views that facilitate workflows or are a mix of note types. list Description from #view/custom sort file.name Note Type Link to heading Views that organize a note type. For descriptions, see USV Glossary [[My published notes]] list from #view/note and !"Hidden" sort file.name Fields Link to heading list Description from #view/field and !
